TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit FontUnit extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 表示字体的大小。

span.span: Represents the size of a font.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用对象对于多个控件一次更改的样式属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use a object to change the style properties for multiple controls at one time. 每次之一`Style`属性值发生了更改，每个控件必须调用其方法。Each time one of the `Style` property values changes, each control must call its method. 在此示例中包括的不是所有控件都支持将演示的所有属性。Not all the controls included in this example support all the properties that are demonstrated. 如果控件不支持特定属性，属性值发生更改时不会更改控件的外观。If a control does not support a particular property, the appearance of the control will not change when the property value is changed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[StyleClass#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StyleClass/CS/styleclasscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[StyleClass#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StyleClass/VB/styleclassvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[StyleClass#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StyleClass/CS/styleclasscs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[StyleClass#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StyleClass/VB/styleclassvb.aspx#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数可以识别的字符串`value`显示下表中创建的新实例类。The constructor recognizes the strings for `value` that are shown in the following table to create a new instance of the class. |字符串值String value|| |------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |`xx-small`, `xxsmall``xx-small`, `xxsmall`|| |`x-small`, `xsmall``x-small`, `xsmall`|| |`x-large`, `xlarge``x-large`, `xlarge`|| |`xx-large`, `xxlarge``xx-large`, `xxlarge`|| |`small`|| |`smaller`|| |`large`|| |`larger`|| |`medium`|| 在所有情况下，属性具有值。In all cases, the property has the value . 字符串比较是不区分大小写。The string comparison is case insensitive. 对于所有其他值的`value`的新实例类创建方法是将`value`字体大小设置以及属性设置为。For all other values of `value`, a new instance of the class is created by treating `value` as a font size and setting the property to .

Internet Explorer 4.0 及更高版本，HTML 呈现的输出与控件从属性设置为此字段是`style= "font-size:Large"`。In Internet Explorer 4.0 and later, the HTML rendered output from a control with the property set to this field is `style= "font-size:Large"`. 在浏览器中早于 Internet Explorer 4.0，HTML 呈现的输出是``。In browsers earlier than Internet Explorer 4.0, the HTML rendered output is ``.

span.span: Represents a object with the property set to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用字段来表示对象属性设置为`FontSize.Smaller`。Use the field to represent a object with the property set to `FontSize.Smaller`. Internet Explorer 4.0 及更高版本，HTML 呈现的输出与控件从属性设置为此字段是`style= "font-size:Smaller"`。In Internet Explorer 4.0 and later, the HTML rendered output from a control with the property set to this field is `style= "font-size:Smaller"`. 在浏览器中早于 Internet Explorer 4.0，HTML 呈现的输出创建。In browsers earlier than Internet Explorer 4.0, no HTML rendered output is created. > [!NOTE] > 某些浏览器不能识别字体大小。Some browers do not recognize the font size. 检查浏览器兼容性。Check your browser for compatibility.

summary.span: 将 对象转换为字符串表示形式。

span.span: Converts the object to a string representation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来检索的字符串表示形式。Use the method to retrieve the string representation of the . 如果属性设置为`FontSize.AsUnit`，返回的字符串是等效的字符串中包含属性。If the property is set to `FontSize.AsUnit`, the returned string is the string equivalent of the contained in the property. 如果属性设置为任何其他值，返回的字符串是等效的字符串值。If the property is set to any other value, the returned string is the string equivalent of the value.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string ToString(class System.IFormatProvider formatProvider) cil managed
Public Function ToString (formatProvider As IFormatProvider) As String

param.name: formatProvider
param.span: 一个 ，提供区域性特定格式设置信息，此信息用于 属性设置为 值的情况；否则，它会被忽略。

span.span: An that supplies culture-specific formatting information, which is used if the property is set to the value; otherwise, it is ignored.

summary.span: 使用指定的格式提供程序将一个 对象转换为字符串等效项。

span.span: Converts a object to a string equivalent using the specified format provider.

returns.span: 表示此 的字符串，其中任何数字单位值都具有 指定的格式。

span.span: A string that represents this , with any numeric unit value in the format specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来检索的字符串表示形式对象的任何数值的字符串中使用特定于区域性的格式提供程序。Use the method to retrieve the string representation of the object using a culture-specific format provider for any numeric values that are in the string. 如果属性设置为值，返回的字符串是等效的字符串中包含的单元值属性。If the property is set to the value, the returned string is the string equivalent of the unit value that is contained in the property. 数字部分值进行格式设置使用指定`formatProvider`。The numeric portion of the value is formatted using the specified `formatProvider`. 换而言之，当属性设置为使用生成的值，返回的字符串表示形式存储中的单元对象上的方法属性。In other words, when the property is set to the value, the returned string representation is generated using the method on the unit object that is stored in the property. 如果属性设置为任何其他值，返回的字符串是等效的字符串值。If the property is set to any other value, the returned string is the string equivalent of the value.
